languages.text: Разбитое оружие явно играет значимую роль в будущем, предначертанным Ткачом Судеб. Расстаться с любым из осколков будет означать потерять доверие покровителя.

The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of the Rogue Trader's patron.
languages.original_text: Разбитое оружие явно играет значимую роль в будущем, предначертанным Ткачом Судеб. Расстаться с любым из осколков будет означать потерять доверие покровителя.

traits.locale_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.
The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.
The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.
The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of your patron.

languages.text: Die geborstene Waffe spielt in der vom Weber der Schicksale vorherbestimmten Zukunft eindeutig eine wichtige Rolle. Die Aufgabe auch nur eines Splitters hieße das Vertrauen des Patrons {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu verlieren.
languages.original_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of the Rogue Trader's patron.

traits.locale_text: Die geborstene Waffe spielt in der vom Weber der Schicksale vorherbestimmten Zukunft eindeutig eine wichtige Rolle. Die Aufgabe auch nur eines Splitters hieße das Vertrauen des Patrons {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu verlieren.

Die geborstene Waffe spielt in der vom Weber der Schicksale vorherbestimmten Zukunft eindeutig eine bedeutende Rolle. Trennst du dich auch nur von einem der Splitter, verlierst du das Vertrauen deines Patrons.

languages.text: De toute évidence, l'arme brisée a un rôle crucial à jouer dans l'avenir tracé par le Tisseur de Destins. Vous séparer de ses fragments reviendrait à trahir la confiance {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of the Rogue Trader's patron.

traits.locale_text: De toute évidence, l'arme brisée a un rôle crucial à jouer dans l'avenir tracé par le Tisseur de Destins. Vous séparer de ses fragments reviendrait à trahir la confiance {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: El arma fragmentada tiene un papel esencial que desempeñar en el futuro prescrito por el Tejedor de Destinos. Separarse de cualquiera de los fragmentos acarrearía la pérdida de confianza del patrón de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of the Rogue Trader's patron.

traits.locale_text: El arma fragmentada tiene un papel esencial que desempeñar en el futuro prescrito por el Tejedor de Destinos. Separarse de cualquiera de los fragmentos acarrearía la pérdida de confianza del patrón de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: 很显然，在命运编织者预言的未来中，这把武器的碎片扮演着重要的角色。一旦行商浪人失去任何一块碎片，都会导致彻底失去庇护主的信任。
languages.original_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of the Rogue Trader's patron.

traits.locale_text: 很显然，在命运编织者预言的未来中，这把武器的碎片扮演着重要的角色。一旦行商浪人失去任何一块碎片，都会导致彻底失去庇护主的信任。
很显然，在命运编织者预言的未来中，这把武器的碎片扮演着重要的角色。一旦失去任何一块碎片，都会导致彻底失去了庇护主的信任。

languages.text: 粉々になった武器は、どう考えても運命の織り手に定められた未来で重要な役割を果たすものだ。破片を手放すことは、自由開拓者の支援者の信頼を失うことになるだろう。
languages.original_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of the Rogue Trader's patron.

traits.locale_text: 粉々になった武器は、どう考えても運命の織り手に定められた未来で重要な役割を果たすものだ。破片を手放すことは、自由開拓者の支援者の信頼を失うことになるだろう。
粉々になった武器は、どう考えても運命の操り手に定められた未来で重要な役割を果たす。破片を手放すことは、後ろ盾する者の信頼を失うことになるだろう。

languages.text: Parçalanmış silahın, Kader Dokuyan tarafından öngörülen gelecekte önemli bir rol oynayacağı bariz. Parçalardan birini kaybetmek, haminin güvenini kaybetmek anlamına gelecek.
languages.original_text: The shattered weapon clearly has a significant role to play in the future preordained by the Weaver of Destinies. To part with any of the shards would mean losing the trust of the Rogue Trader's patron.
